Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Price: $699.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:59:49 UTC – Details)


Dell Inspiron Compact Desktop 3891 is engineered with: 11th Generation Intel® Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz), 12GB 2933MHz DDR4 (8Gx1 + 4Gx1, 1 TB 7200 RPM [SATA] (HDD) 3.5-inch, Intel® UHD Graphics 730 with shared graphics memory, Black
11th Generation Intel Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz)
12GB 2933MHz DDR4 (8Gx1 + 4Gx1), 1 TB 7200 RPM SATA HDD 3.5-inch
Intel Wi-Fi 6 2×2 (Gig+) + Bluetooth 5.1

Previous page
Next page

Performance you can count on

Latest processor: Built with the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor you can expect fast, reliable performance and an exceptional PC experience.

  • 11th Gen Intel Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz)
  • Intel UHD Graphics 730 with shared graphics memory
  • 1TB 7200RPM 3.5″ SATA hard drive
  • 12GB (8Gx1 + 4Gx1) DDR4, 2933MHz memory

Minimal design, maximum efficiency.

Space-saving exterior: Our latest Inspiron Compact Desktop is designed to be space-efficient to compliment your work from home setup or office environment.

Finish tasks faster: Watch all your applications perform at their fullest with features including memory of 12GB DDR4, at 2933 MHz.

Your command center: Connect all your devices in a snap with plenty of front facing ports for easy access.

Ports and Slots

1. Power Button | 2. Global Headset Jack | 3. (2) USB 2.0 | 4. (1) USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C | 5. (1) USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A

Essential accessories for your Inspiron Compact Desktop

Dell 24 Monitor – S2421HS

Dell Keyboard & Mouse -KM7120W

Dell 27 Monitor – S2721HS

Clear views

Superb screen clarity in 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution on a 23.8″ monitor.

Conveniently switch

Seamlessly connect to three PCs.

Consistent colors

Superb screen clarity in 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution

Adjust to your comfort

Pivot, tilt, swivel and adjust the height for a comfortable setup all day long.

Easy Pairing

Instantly pair each device with your compatible Windows 10 system via Bluetooth.

Dell EasyArrange

Stay organized between applications, emails and windows on one screen.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $1,399.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:23:43 UTC – Details)


CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.
System: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G 3.9GHz 6-Core | AMD B550 Chipset | 16GB DDR4 | 500GB NVMe SSD | 2TB HDD
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 8GB Video Card | 1x HDMI | 2x DisplayPort
Connectivity: 6 x USB 3.1 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | 802.11AC Wi-Fi | Audio: 7.1 Channel | Keyboard and mouse
Special feature: Tempered glass side case panel | Custom RGB case lighting | RGB 7 colors gaming mouse
1 year parts & labor | Free lifetime tech support





About CyberPowerPC:

CyberPowerPC gaming systems are the choice of top gamers everywhere, from pro esports players to pro streamers. However, although it’s used by the best, it’s built for any and every gamer out there. We challenge you to Get On Our Level. Let us give you the tools to take you to top. Every game you dominate, every level you smash, every competition you win, we want to be a part of that every step of the way.

  • Intel Marketing Partner of the Year 2020.
  • Microsoft US Partner of the Year 2020.

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master – AMD Series

Enthusiast Level Gaming Computer System

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.

  • VR Ready with HTC VIVE and Oculus Rift.
  • Optimized for gaming at Ultra High game settings and high resolutions.
  • AMD Ryzen Processor
  • Performance NVIDIA Graphics Processor
  • Wireless 802.11 AC Wi-Fi
  • Gaming Keyboard and RGB 7 Color Mouse Combo

AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX : Powered by the latest AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX Processor(8 Cores, 16 Threads, 16M Cache, up to 4.60GHz), Radeon RX Vega 8 integrated graphics(up to 2100 MHz). 8 cores and 16 threads to divide and conquer multiple tasks at once.
RAM & Storage: 16GB DDR4 3200MHz dual channel RAM(upgradable to 64 GB), 512GB M.2 2280 PCle 3.0 SSD, performed multiple tasks with faster response speed and multi-threaded sensitive response. 2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot x2 for future expansion as your need.
Video Outputs & Liquid Metal Boosts Cooling: With four video output interfaces—HDMI (4K@60Hz) x2, and DisplayPort(4K@60Hz)x2. You can drive four independent 4K 60Hz displays for extreme productivity. Elevates performance with a premium liquid metal compound on the CPU, features direct CPU contact, a wide degree of open ventilation, and a smart fan that efficiently spins up when required to effectively transfer heat directly out the system for quiet and cool performance.
Strong Connectition: 1 x RJ45 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet Port, 5 x USB 3.0 Ports(Gen1) , 1 x USB-C Port, 1 x Clear CMOS , 2 x HDMI Ports, 2 x Display Ports, 2 x MIC, 2 x LINE OUT. WiFi 6, BT 5.1. Enough to connect various devices to meet various application scenarios.
Package & Other Functions: 1x HX90 Mini PC, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x HDMI Cable, 1x Power Adapter, 1x Instruction Manual. Functions: RTC wake up / Wake on Lan / Auto Power on / Network boot.24/7 Support, professional technical team.

(4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually ... Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:12:33 UTC – Details)



【High-Performance Processor】Beelink MINI S built-in faster 11 generation Intel Jasper Lake Processor N5095 base frequency 2.0GHz, up to 2.9 GHz. (4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually home entertainment, streaming video, Web browsing, work, and games.
【Storage Expansion Options】The MINI S Mini Computer built-in 8 GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA/HDD in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance) and supports up to 2TB of 2.5-inch SATA HDD / SSD.
【Support 4K Dual Screen Display】The Mini Computer equipped with Intel UHD Graphics to support support 4K FPS video playback, which brings you first-class viewing .Dual HDMI allows you to connect two displays at the same time,thereby reducing waiting time and improving your work efficiency.
【Efficient Heat Dissipation & WIFI5】Beelink Mini Pc comes with quite large fan and heat sink which can keep the Mini Pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Built in WIFI 5 (802.11 b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth 4.0.
【Auto Power On & Beelink Technical Support】If you want to auto power on, please send us the barcode at the bottom of the machine first, and we will send the corresponding tutorial file. All our products have obtained FCC, CE ROSH certification. We provide 1 year 7 days / 24 hours service and lifetime help with technical issues, no need to worry about quality issues, just email our customer service team.

iBUYPOWER Pro Gaming PC Computer Desktop TraceMR 252i (Intel Core i9 – 12900KF, GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB, 32GB DDR4 3200MHz , 1 TB NVMe SSD + 2 TB HDD, WiFi ready, Windows 11 Home).
System: iBUYPOWER TraceMR 252i Intel Core i9 – 12900KF 3.2GHz (Max 5.2GHz)|GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB | 32 GB 3200MHz DDR4 RAM | 1 TB NVMe SSD + 2 TB HDD| iBUYPOWER 240mm Liquid Cooling | Z690 Chipsset Motherboard| Genuine Windows 11 Home 64-bit
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB Dedicated Gaming Video Card | VR Ready | 1x HDMI | 3x Display Port
Connectivity: 4 x USB 3.0 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | HD Audio Jacks: Line in / Front Speaker / Microphone
Special Add-Ons: 802.11AC Wi-Fi Included | Free iBuyPower Gaming Keyboard & RGB Gaming Mouse | No Bloatware | Warranty: 1 Year Parts & Labor + Free Lifetime US Tech Support | Assembled in the U.S.A

RGB | RADIANT. GORGEOUS. BEAUTIFUL

Illuminate and showcase your gaming rig’s internals with four RGB fans, designed to keep your system cool while you lock in for the grind ahead with the all-new iBUYPOWER Trace5MR Case.

TraceMR 252i

Since 1999, iBUYPOWER has been delivering on its promise to build the best gaming systems for the most discerning gamers. Even in a time when PCs were not as ubiquitous as they are today, we fueled the passion for gaming by giving our customers the highest quality in custom-built computers. Our systems have since become the backbone for professional gamers, game developers, LAN centers, major esports tournaments, and every day consumers.

iBUYPOWER TraceMR 252i

Extreme Performance Gaming PC

Introducing the iBUYPOWER TraceMR 252i! This system comes with the latest Intel i9-12900KF processor, a great value to performance CPU which will help run games at great frame rates. Booting up alongside the Intel i9-11900KF is an Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB graphics card, this GPU is able to handle any modern AAA titles, 4K video editing, and other demanding tasks with no problem.

  • Intel i9-12900KF processor 3.2 GHz
  • Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 24 GB
  • 32 GB DDR4 RAM RGB
  • 1 TB SSD
  • 2 TB HDD
  • 240mm RGB Liquid Cooler
  • WIFI Ready
  • VR Ready

Read more

Massive Power, Perfectly Balance

Intel i9-12900KF 3.2 GHz (5.2 GHz) CPU delivers the ultimate performance. With 8 Cores and 16 processing threads, whether you’re playing the latest games, designing the next skyscraper, or crunching scientific data, this CPU will be able to tickle any tasks.

Read more

Ultimate 8K Gaming

The GeForce RTX 3090 is a big ferocious GPU (BFGPU) with TITAN class performance. Power by Nvidia’s 2nd generation RTX architecture and with a staggering 24 GB of G6X memory, you can only get the ultimate gaming experience.

Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $549.00 - $499.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:13:04 UTC – Details)


The premium Dell Inspiron 15 laptop, with powerful computing and connectivity features, is built for speed, multitasking and collaboration. Sleek, small, durable, the high performing PC delivers unparalleled results and snappy experience for intensive applications or everyday tasks at work, school or life. Super thin and light for easy portability

Processor
The powerful 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 (6 MB cache, 2 cores, 4 threads, up to 4.10 GHz Turbo)

Memory
16GB RAM invigorates powerful multitasking and seamless experience

Hard Drive
1TB HDD delivers instant boot-up, fast data access

Display & Graphics
15.6″, FHD 1920×1080, 60Hz, Non-Touch, AG, WVA, LED-Backlit, Narrow Border Display delivers a clear, crispy image that’s easy on your eye; Intel UHD Graphics

Operating System
Windows 11 Pro (64-bit) – perfect for business/education

Ports
1 USB 2.0, 2 USB 3.2 ports – for quick data transfers
1 SD-card slot
1x HDMI – for connecting to HDTV or monitor
1x Headphone output/Microphone input combo – with studio-quality sound
720p at 30 fps HD camera with microphone – ready for remote work and online class

Premium Features
Wireless Connectivity: 802.11ac 1×1 WiFi and Bluetooth
Warranty:1-year manufacturer warranty
Battery: 3 Cell, 41 Wh, integrated – long lasting battery life

[POWERFUL PERFORMANCE]: The Dell Inspiron Laptop is powered with the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 (6 MB cache, 2 cores, 4 threads, up to 4.10 GHz Turbo) and 16GB high-bandwidth DDR4 memory, powerful processing for advanced multitasking, demanding computing, smooth gaming, multiple tabs browsing, and everyday tasks. 1TB HDD offers ample storage, quick boot-up times, fast data access, and improves the overall performance
[PREMIUM DESIGN]: Designed to last through regular use, with tiny rubber feet and bumpers on the hinge that keep it from skidding and provide additional stability when on hard surfaces. Work in comfort thanks to a lift hinge that raises your device to an ergonomic angle, which provides a more comfortable typing angle. Get an expansive keyboard with a numeric keypad, 6.4% larger keycaps and a spacious touchpad that makes it easier to navigate your content.
[STUNNING VISUALS]: Get more screen in a 15.6″ laptop with three-side narrow borders for an immersive FHD viewing experience. Dell ComfortView Low Blue Light Software solutions help reduce harmful blue light emissions and optimize eye comfort over extended viewing. Comes with ExpressCharge capabilities that minimize the time you spend tethered to an outlet and will recharge your battery up to 80% in 60 minutes.
[COLLABORATION READY]: Windows 11 Pro 64-bit, protects your data with enterprise-grade security, boosts productivity with powerful management tools, and keeps going with long battery life. A built-in HD webcam that makes you look great.
[HIGH EFFICIENCY]: The windows laptop PC is sensibly optimized for efficiency: 802.11ac 1×1 WiFi and Bluetooth for seamless experience with videos/music. 1x 720p at 30 fps HD camera, 1x Stereo speakers with Waves MaxxAudio Pro, 1x Headphone output/Microphone input delivers cinema experience, ready for remote work, online class, virtual communication. 1-year manufacturer warranty.

Product Description

Out of Sight Power

High performance

The OptiPlex 790, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving Micro chassis.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core CPU, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 790 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3GHz Storage: 500GB HDD Optical: DVDRW Port: USB 2.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 790 like DP port, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection.Support Dual display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 4th Gen Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 790 for each user’s needs.

Rebust storage and memory

The combination of key integrated components allows this computer to excel at work, home or school. DDR3 RAM allows for efficient multi-tasking, and abundant hard drive space provides ample room to store files, apps, music and movies.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 790 comes with DVDRW drive supports reading and writing DVD data.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 790 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

Product Description

ViprTech Snowstorm (AMD) Black

Specifications: CPU: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (4-Core @ 3.7Ghz Turbo) Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 2GB RAM: 8GB DDR4 Primary Storage: 128GB M.2 SSD (Boot Drive) Secondary Storage: 500GB 7200RPM HDD NOTE:

Please keep in mind that brands/colors may not exactly match pictures, we use a variety of brands in our PCs.

Prebuilt gaming computer with awesome built-in RGB. This PC is not only a great entry point into PC gaming, it’s also great for everyday use, editing, day trading / crypto trading, and more!

Games tested:

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Far Cry

Grand Theft Auto V Overwatch

DoTA 2 Rocket League

Fortnite Minecraft

Roblox Team Fortress 2

League of Legends Overwatch

Although we test each build to ensure it can handle most popular games, please check the minimum specs for the specific game you want to play to make sure this computer meets those.

Insane Bootup Times

Take advantage of insanely fast bootup and loading times with the included 128GB M.2 SSD (brand/model may vary).

Built-In Gorgeous RGB Lighting

Light up your rig and showcase your internals with the ViprTech built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any true gaming PC.

Why choose us?

Affordable

Every PC is designed with affordability in mind, while preserving quality and reliability. Thus, keeping more money in your pocket.

Extensive Testing Process

Before a PC leaves our facility, it goes through a rigorous benchmarking and stress testing process, faulty or underperforming components are identified and replaced.

Made in the USA

Every one of our PCs is hand built by PC experts in the USA, providing jobs to Americans and ensuring we are able to provide the best quality systems possible.

Superior Support

We perform all technical support in-house. No more sitting on hold for hours, waiting in a call queue, or endlessly navigating through phone menu options, if you call you get a real person right away. We believe this is the only way to do it right.

System: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (3.7GHz Turbo), AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB M.2 SSD, 500GB HDD, Genuine Windows 10 Pro, RGB lighting enabled case
Showcase your internals with the built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any gaming PC and sure to make your rig stand out. Controlled via a button on the case.olled via a button on the case.
Enjoy insanely fast bootup times with the included 128GB M.2 Boot SSD, while still having plenty of storage with the 500GB secondary drive. Easily add additional storage if desired or add more DDR4 RAM (supports up to 32GB) or a dedicated GPU for even better performance
Tested to run games such as: CSGO, Far Cry, GTA V, Overwatch, DoTA 2, Rocket League, Fortnite, Minecraft, Roblox, Team Fortress 2, and many more!
Every ViprTech PC is built by hand in the USA and is stress-tested extensively before shipping. We stand behind our product and include a free 1 year warranty.
